post_detail.title: VISIT TO THE MOMA WITH NOOT
post_detail.description: by CHRISTAN on JANUARY 24, 2013 · in NEWS & PEOPLE A fantastic surprise visit this week from NOOT designer, Tania Petit. Flying in from Paris for a change of air as well to support her role in Showroom ICU’s press preview at 25 Park. We took a break amongst the press madness to the MOMA for a well deserved creative fix.
